name: QUEEN (Monet&AdonisStudios)
description:
Across the multiverse of galaxies, factions of humans and other extraterrestrial life forms learn to coexist. This comes at a cost where galactic poverty and species exploitation runs rampant. A large space-based conglomerate called "MALLARD MEN INC. " have systematically caused mass genocide through harvesting the embryonic forms of multiple factions for their genetic modification experiments. With your capture as the of the Queen of the Yeco Clan, you must find the eggs that were harvested from your asexual reproductive system. Due to the malicious experiments you must constantly feed as many of your organs are mutilated beyond repair. As Queen you must protect your young and escape the deep dark world of the MALLARD MEN INC.

WASD = Movement LEFT CLICK = Eat E = Interact RIGHT CLICK = Feminine Urge Roar

+THIS IS A DEMO+

**UPDATES WILL BE DROPPED 90 DAYS** ~ MAStudios GameDev
